_sText:
FINAL FIX VERSION
===================
In the FIX version I noticed a small problem to be left alone to play to 10 people but now lets play more with a maximum of about 40 or thereabouts.
The Glass aviation map in the middle of it away because it was anti-aesthetic.

===========================================
Area football games to drive.
Has infermeria.
It has a kitchen.
In armeria a lift.
There is a glass to protect ct right in the beginning so that the items last longer.
Besides hay pa suicide isolation and hit enter.
And there is a secret room where there is 1 TV with vigilanzia camera to view the jail.

In version 3 I have 2 tests and deathrun style at the end of each test is a shell with luzes.
I put a password on the door leading to pool havitacion secret where there is a surveillance screen.

Final Version
=============
Added a top aviation pool where to place before the prisoners inside and not go ke.
Now there are 4 levels and the last deathrun have to guess the door leading to armeria that this is the prize.
The football is bigger now with goalposts and a ball better even better.
Now if you fail at some level deathrun not kill directly but ke you fall into the fire and some life kita you, except that I added a door to exit ke deathrun if you can not see.
There are now more ammunition in the weapons armeria.
And added a pair of objects in the jail to do a bit of Butler.
